author: craigmcc
msg: Correct destination of the xerces.jar copy for the struts-upload example,

author: craigmcc
msg: Recognize cancelled form submits even if the Cancel "button" is an <input>
tag of type "image", so that the X and Y coordainates of the button press

author: craigmcc
msg: Register local copies of the web application deployment descriptor DTDs
for both servlet 2.2 and servlet 2.3.  This allows Struts to parse your
web.xml file (to determine how it was mapped) even in environments where
access to the Internet -- to go get the DTDs -- is not possible.
